title: What are some interesting and advanced science fair projects for high school students? - Quora

response.answer_text: There used to be books written on that subject, I believe some were sponsored by Scientific American. I remember as a freshman in high school, I read one of those books and like the idea of building a seismograph. I built it and then took data comparing the recorded signature of large trucks versus school buses passing my house on the way to the near-by high school. Easy. Try the library.
